channel.title: Interactive npc
channel.description:
alright me and my staff had a meeting we decided we needed somebody or something to keep every part of the server a happy nice helpfull place so we thought thought thought a bit more untill we had an idea
an npc u can talk to and that can do stuff wen it heres an offenisve word a phrase or teleport u if u say something and it replys other stuff but nobody know if its even possible?
if anybody could help it would be a great help to me and all the other people who play my server

item.title: Interactive npc
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

probably in the enter text method

have it scan the area for the npc’s within 10 steps of u, force talk them to say “watch your language”+playerName+"!"

Read full topic
